divs: Sighting DetailsWife and I sitting at camp fire looking at stars. Wife sees it first and draws my attention to it. Never seen anything like it before. Had no idea what it was. Very large and bright moving slowly N to S. About 30 seconds to it fadding to a red dot and vanishing. No trail. Amazed at seeing something so unidentifiable. I have seen meteors and comets before.
Summary: moving at speed of satalite, very large, faded to red dot then vanished.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Salida CO.
This sighting has never been favorited.
